message.reasoning: First, I will use get_reverse_geocoding to convert user location into readable address. Next, I will find spicy food restaurants within the radius of that location using get_text_search. The function returns 20 top places, but I have filtered them to match user's preference which is spicy food. Then I return the places ID in for of array to be consumed by front-end.
message.message: Here are some spicy food I found near your location.
